1.13.3.en: Moved installation instructions from app store to community support topic.

1.14.0.en: Added support for Shelly Dimmer/SL (thx to domotica-shop.nl for supplying the device)

1.14.1.en: Skip the login credentials screen during pairing for devices that do not have authentication set up.

1.14.2.en: Fixed issue with pairing introduced with previous version (1.14.1).

1.15.0.en: Added support for the Shelly Door Window Sensor.

1.16.0.en: BREAKING CHANGES: complete overhaul of the Shelly 2 Relay and Shelly 4 Pro drivers to split them into seperate devices for each channel without polling the device for each channel. This will break current support for these drivers. You will need to re-pair your devices and fix your flows. Sorry for any inconvenience.

1.16.1.en: BREAKING CHANGES: complete overhaul of the Shelly 2 Relay and Shelly 4 Pro drivers to split them into seperate devices for each channel without polling the device for each channel. This will break current support for these drivers. You will need to re-pair your devices and fix your flows. Sorry for any inconvenience. Also added support for the temperature add-on for the Shelly 1 and Shelly 1PM.

1.16.2.en: Small fixes for Shelly 2 and Shelly 4 Pro.

1.16.3.en: Added new driver for Shelly 2.5 Rollershutter, you can re-pair it if you have paired as Shelly 2(.5) Rollershutter. Fixed an issue where devices from another type could show up in the pairing wizard. Small improvement to the pairing wizard which might resolve blank screens and timeouts. Added a new trigger card for Shelly 1 and Shelly1PM which can be triggered using the callback URLs. These need to be set using maintenance actions under the device settings. See the app description on the forum for further instructions.

1.17.0.en: BREAKING CHANGES SHELLY EM: the Shelly EM driver has been refactored to avoid double polling. This breaks the current support for these devices and requires you to re-pair your Shelly EM. Sorry for the inconvenience. Als support for the new Shelly 3EM has been added with the release.

1.17.1.en: Small fix for discovery of Shelly 3EM.

1.17.2.en: BREAKING CHANGES Shelly 2.5 Relay: The Shelly 2.5 Relay driver has been refactored to avoid double polling. This breaks the current support for these devices and requires you to re-pair your device. Sorry for the inconvenience. Also other small fixes and improvements.

1.17.3.en: BREAKING CHANGES RGBW2 4xWHITE: The RGBW2 4xWhite driver has been refactored to avoid double polling. This breaks the current support for these devices and requires you to re-pair your device. Sorry for the inconvenience. Added a toggle button for the RGBW2 Color to switch between white and color mode. Added trigger cards for the Shelly Dimmer to trigger flows based on input 1 and 2.

1.17.4.en: Fixes for trigger cards that may also cause some devices to appear as offline (like the Shelly Dimmer).

1.17.5.en: Fixes for trigger cards and missing capabilities for paired devices that may cause some devices to appear as offline (like the Shelly Dimmer).

1.17.6.en: Fix issue with incorrect readings for meter_power and meter_power_wmin capabilities for Shelly 2.5

1.17.7.en: Fixed a bug in the callback trigger card for Shelly1PM. Added the callback trigger card functionality for the Dimmer, Shelly2, Shelly2.5, Plug, Plug-S, ShellyEM and Shelly3EM. These callback URLs need to be set using maintenance actions under the device settings. See the app description on the forum for further instructions.

1.18.0.en: Added support for Shelly Duo and Shelly Vintage.

1.18.1.en: Fixed bugs with setting callback URL for various Shelly devices. Added a reboot action card which reboots your Shelly.

1.18.2.en: Bugfixes for RGBW2 White and the triggercard 'Meter Power in Wmin changed' for Shelly 2.5

1.19.0.en: Added support for the Shelly Smoke Detector.

1.19.1.en: Added the callback trigger card functionality to the Shelly Door/Window sensor. This is more reliable then the current polling implementation. See the documentation on how to use this.

1.19.2.en: Two fixes for using callback URL's for the Shelly Door/Window sensor.

1.20.0.en: Breaking changes: The recently added triggercard for button action callbacks will break because it is replaced by a more generic Action URL card, please update your flows. Polling for the Shelly Flood has been removed and is replaced by report callbacks from the device itself as this is much more reliable. If you have a paired Shelly Flood, please perform the URL callbacks maintenance action to set the callback urls (see the support topic for further instructions). Added manual pairing fallback for all drivers, this is handy for those with segmented networks where auto discovery does not work. And there are some small fixes in various drivers in this release as well.

1.20.1.en: Fix for reboot action card and small improvement for setting callback URL's (appearently the Shelly needs a reboot for these to become active).

1.20.2.en: Fixed issue with duration in the "Change roller shutter" action card.

1.20.3.en: Fix for triggercard for temperature sensor Shelly 1PM.

1.20.4.en: Fix for setting white channel on Shelly RGBW2.

1.21.0.en: BREAKING CHANGES: Deprecated the device "Action event" triggercard and replaced it with a generic "Action event" card which is not device specific but contains the device name as token. This is easier to maintain. Please update your flows by replacing the device specific card with the triggercard from the app. The functionality for the device specific card will be removed with the next major release. Also added support for the new Shelly i3 which was released two days ago, thanx to domotica-shop.nl for sending me a device. Also added a new triggercard that can trigger a flow when a device is unreachable for a specified number of minutes (under device settings). This is only available for non-battery operated devices that are being polled for their status. And also lots a code refactoring for easier maintenance.

1.21.1.en: Added a parameter for the Shelly 2(.5) Roller Shutter which allows you to configure the optical middle as 50%. Useful for roller shutters that do not move the blinds linear and where 50% is not the optical middle. The optical middle can be set under the device maintenance actions. Also added an action card for the Shelly 2(.5) for moving the blinds with an offset percentage. And added an action card for the Shelly 2(.5) for which fires and intelligent action, it will stop the roller shutter when it's moving, opens it if closed and closes it if opened.

1.22.0.en: Added a parameter for the Shelly 2(.5) Roller Shutter which allows you to configure the optical middle as 50%. Useful for roller shutters that do not move the blinds linear and where 50% is not the optical middle. The optical middle can be set under the device maintenance actions. Also added an action card for the Shelly 2(.5) for moving the blinds with an offset percentage. And added an action card for the Shelly 2(.5) for which fires and intelligent action, it will stop the roller shutter when it's moving, opens it if closed and closes it if opened.

1.22.1.en: Added callback events for the Shelly 2(.5) Roller Shutter.

1.22.2.en: Fix for Shelly 2(.5) where setting position returns an error due to incorrect device settings.

1.23.0.en: Added device ID to callback trigger card and removed the old button events card which was deprecated since the last couple of app versions.

1.24.0.en: Added support for Shelly Gas and Shelly Button 1. Also added the option to add a custom device icon (.svg) during pairing for the Shelly Gas, Shelly Button 1, Shelly Plug, Shelly Plug-S, Shelly1 and Shelly 2. More devices will follow. If you want to use a custom icon for an existing devices re-pairing is required. It cant be changed after pairing.

1.25.0.en: Added the option for custom device icons (.svg) for all devices. If you want to use a custom icon for an existing devices re-pairing is required. It cant be changed after pairing. Also optimized the way the action events / callbacks work. For the Shelly Door/Window sensor this means the events open_dark and open_twilight have changed to dark and twilight. And replaced the polling of the Shelly H&T sensor to using the report url callback functionality. Also reduced lines of code by re-using templates.

1.25.1.en: Fix for issue with Shelly HT driver.

1.25.2.en: Fix for Shelly HT and Shelly Button 1 crashes.

1.25.3.en: Fix for Shelly HT and Shelly Button 1 crashes and fix for custom device icon for devices with multiple device instance upon pairing.

1.25.4.en: Added support for Shelly Door/Window sensor 2 and added the tamper capability to the Door/Window sensor (2).

1.25.5.en: Fix issue with pairing devices introduced with version 1.25.4.

1.25.6.en: Added temperature and tilt capability to the Shelly Door/Window (2) sensor and some other minor improvements.

3.0.29.en: Code improvements for easier maintenance and a small fix for switching between color modes of the Shelly Bulb.

3.0.35.en: Fix issue with dim values for RGBW2 White.

3.0.36.en: Add ADC voltage for Shelly Uni and fix small issue with dimming being null for RGBW2.

3.0.43.en: Added a workaround for firmware issue with auto discovery of Shelly motion sensor, also added the firmware check condition card and firmware update card for Shelly 1L. Removed the temperature and humidity capability for Shelly 1/1PM/1L if no external sensors are present and fixed issue with switching between color and temperature mode for Shelly RGBW2 Color.

3.0.44.en: Added a workaround for firmware issue with auto discovery of Shelly motion sensor, also added the firmware check condition card and firmware update card for Shelly 1L. Removed the temperature and humidity capability for Shelly 1/1PM/1L if no external sensors are present and fixed issue with switching between color and temperature mode for Shelly RGBW2 Color.

3.0.45.en: Fixed an error when setting dimmer to 0 brightness, also fixed an issue where flow cards where not showing up on the Shelly 1L. Added a possible fix for some RGBW2 devices returning a 404 error after the previous release and included some additional error handling for network communication errors.

3.0.46.en: Branding improvements and preparations for the upcoming Shelly4Pro. No functional changes in this release.

3.0.48.en: Fix for pairing the Shelly Motion Sensor.

3.0.49.en: Added support for the first generation Shelly Air, fix for updating the white mode capability when white channel from RGBW2 is changed and added better capability description for light_temperature for RGBW2 as it's used for setting the white channel instead of light temperature.

3.0.50.en: Minor branding improvements, no functional changes.

3.0.51.en: Possible fix for reading ADCS for Shelly Uni.

3.1.0.en: Breaking change: due to code clean up this update breaks the upgrade path for user still on Homey firmware 4.x and lower. If you still need to update your Homey to firmware 5.x or higher you will need to re-pair your devices to avoid issues. Other then code clean up there are no functional changes in this release.

3.2.0.en: Add support for the new Shelly Pro 4PM (uses websockets for communication). Also upgraded the shellies-coap library and some other minor improvements.

3.3.0.en: Added a generic firmware is available triggercard and deprecated the firmware available conditon card which is now obsolete. Please update your flows accordingly.. Deprecated the custom flipback switch 2 and flipback switch 4 action cards. These have become obsolete a long time ago, please update your flows to use the regular flipback switch card. Some other minor improvements in there as well.

3.3.5.en: Fixed an issue with device icons not displaying correctly.

3.3.6.en: Fixed an issue with device icons not displaying correctly.

3.3.7.en: Fixed an issue with the 2nd input of a multichannel devices updating incorrectly. Code improvements for the newly added support for Homey Cloud.

3.3.8.en: Added support for the Shelly Button 1 on Homey Cloud. Also added dimming transition for the dimmer, RGBW2, Duo and Vintage on Homey Pro (limited to 5 seconds due to Shelly API limitations). And fixed a bug in the momentary flipback switch action card.

3.4.0.en: Fixed issue with dimming on Shelly Vintage. Possibly fixed an issue with the intelligent action for Shelly 2(.5) roller shutter. Added support for Door/Window, Motion, Flood, Humidity/Temperature and Smoke sensors on Homey Cloud.

3.4.1.en: Initial state of devices added to Homey Cloud is now updated. Removed some deprecated flow cards, make sure to fix your flows if you missed the previous announcements.

3.4.2.en: Add support for Shelly Plus 1 and Shelly Plus 1PM next generation devices. Fixed a bug with the flipback switch for relay devices.

3.4.3.en: Added RSSI WiFi signal to all devices. Fixed an issue with action events for Shelly Plus devices after an API update. And fixed an issue with the flipback switch action card for multichannel devices.

3.4.4.en: Fixed an issue with the inputs for GEN1 devices with multiple channels. Fixed an issue with inputs for GEN2 (Plus) devices.

3.4.5.en: Fixed an issue with the inputs for GEN1 devices with multiple channels. Fixed an issue with inputs for GEN2 (Plus) devices.

3.4.6.en: Updated the Shelly Uni icon. Improved the dimming capability of the Shelly Dimmer, it not respects the transition time. Fixed a small issue with crashes on Homey Cloud.

3.4.7.en: Fixed an issue with switching channel 2-4 of the Shelly 4Pro Plus and added trigger cards for the input of the Shelly 4Pro Plus.

3.4.8.en: Fixed an issue with switching channel 2-4 of the Shelly 4Pro Plus and added trigger cards for the input of the Shelly 4Pro Plus.

3.4.9.en: Fix for meter power capability displaying in watt-hours instead of kWh on Shelly Plus devices.

3.4.10.en: Fix for meter power capability displaying in watt-hours instead of kWh on Shelly Plus devices.

3.4.11.en: Fix for incorrect calculation meter power capability on Shelly Plus devices.

3.5.0.en: Support for Shelly TRV, Shelly Pro 1, Shelly Pro 1PM, Shelly Pro 2 and Shelly Pro 2PM for local Homey has been added. Also the device temperature for Shelly 2.5 rollershutter has been added for local Homey. And the device overpowered trigger card has been deprecated. Please use the generic device error trigger card available on app level which now also reports overpower, overtemperature, overvoltage and overcurrent errors for Shelly Pro and Plus devices.

3.5.1.en: Support for Shelly TRV, Shelly Pro 1, Shelly Pro 1PM, Shelly Pro 2 and Shelly Pro 2PM for local Homey has been added. Also the device temperature for Shelly 2.5 rollershutter has been added for local Homey. And the device overpowered trigger card has been deprecated. Please use the generic device error trigger card available on app level which now also reports overpower, overtemperature, overvoltage and overcurrent errors for Shelly Pro and Plus devices.

3.5.2.en: Support for Shelly TRV for Homey local has been added. Also support for Shelly Pro 1, Shelly Pro 1PM, Shelly Pro 2 and Shelly Pro 2PM for local Homey and Homey Cloud has been added. Also the device temperature for Shelly 2.5 rollershutter has been added for local Homey. And the device overpowered trigger card has been deprecated. Please use the generic device error trigger card available on app level which now also reports overpower, overtemperature, overvoltage and overcurrent errors for Shelly Pro and Plus devices.

3.5.3.en: Use the user-configured profile names for Shelly TRV instead of default profile names for profile condition and action card.

3.5.4.en: Small improvements. CoAP / CoIot is now disabled on gen1 devices when removed from Homey Pro. Users are given the option to manually pair their device in the scenario where some devices are not discovered over mDNS but others are but have already been paired. And better clean up running processes before the app is updated on Homey Cloud.

3.5.5.en: This release fix a bug for devices not being discovered when pairing the first Shelly device with Homey and a bug where Shelly Plus devices can not be paired manually if needed.

3.5.6.en: Added a new action card for Shelly TRV to set the external measured temperature through a flow for Homey Pro. And finally fixed the 400 error when setting the position of blinds for the Shelly 2(.5) rollershutter for Homey Pro. Also fixed the parsing status updates for Gen2/Plus devices connected to Homey Cloud. Improved the error handling when setting dim duration for lights above 5 seconds which Shelly devices do not support for Homey Pro. Setting dim when light is off for the Duo, RGBW2 Color, RGBW2 White and Vintage now also turns on the light and sets the dim in a single action similar to the dimmer for Homey Pro and Homey. And permanently removed the overpowered trigger card. Itâ€™s been replaced by the generic device error trigger card available on app level.

3.5.7.en: This releases fixes an issue where the status of GEN2/Plus device connected to Homey Cloud is not updated. Also update some of the used frameworks due to security issues.

3.5.8.en: The release contains some small bug fixes.

3.5.9.en: This release contains a breaking change. If you recently paired any GEN2/Plus devices with Homy Cloud/Beta you will need to re-pair your devices to make sure it receives status updates. The release also adds support for Shelly Plus i4 for Homey Cloud. It also contains a possible fix for rollershutters not updating to the correct position when halfway setting is set.

3.5.10.en: This release attempts to fix the missing status updates for devices paired with Homey Beta/Cloud. It also adds all input flowcards for the Shellyi4 when paired with Homey Beta/Cloud.

3.6.0.en: This release contains breaking changes. The halfway setting from Shelly 2(.5) Roller Shutter has been removed due to ongoing issues with this functionality which is not part of the Shelly eco system. The already deprecated RGBW2 CWWW driver has been completely removed. The release also adds support for Shelly Pro 2 and Shelly Pro 2PM in roller shutter mode for Homey Pro.

3.6.2.en: This release adds support for Shelly Plus 2PM in relay and roller shutter mode for Homey Pro. It also contains some code refactoring.

3.6.9.en: This release adds support for Shelly Plus 2PM in relay mode for Homey Pro and Homey Cloud/Beta and in roller shutter mode for Homey Pro. It also fixes an issue with correct status updates for the inputs on Plus/Pro devices. And it contains code refactoring.

3.6.10.en: This release adds support for Shelly Plus 2PM in relay mode for Homey Pro and Homey Cloud/Beta and in roller shutter mode for Homey Pro. It also fixes an issue with correct status updates for the inputs on Plus/Pro devices. And it contains code refactoring.

3.7.0.en: This release contains a breaking change for Shelly Plus 1 and Shelly Plus 1PM devices. The devices need to be re-paired due to architectural changes in the app allowing for better maintenance. The release also adds support for Shelly Plus 2PM in relay mode for Homey Pro and Homey Cloud/Beta and in roller shutter mode for Homey Pro. It also fixes an issue with correct status updates for the inputs on Plus/Pro devices. And it contains code refactoring.

3.7.3.en: This release fixes some small issues. Push actions events for Shelly 1PM should be registered again on Homey Pro. Decimal numbers are allowed for manually setting the external temperature for the Shelly TRV on Homey Pro and the dimming of the Shelly RGBW2 should be working again on Homey Pro.

3.8.0.en: This release includes a breaking change for Homey Cloud / Beta users. The way Homey Beta/Cloud connected devices communicate with Shelly Cloud has changed, this requires you to remove and re-pair all your Homey Cloud / Beta connected Shelly devices. Sorry for the inconvenience but this is very much needed for future development. The release also adds all roller shutter devices for Homey Cloud / Beta. A firmware update action card for Shelly Plus/Pro devices for Homey Pro has been added. Some device icons for new Plus and Pro devices have been updated. And it contains lots and lots of code improvements.

3.8.1.en: This release includes a breaking change for Homey Cloud / Beta users. The way Homey Beta/Cloud connected devices communicate with Shelly Cloud has changed, this requires you to remove and re-pair all your Homey Cloud / Beta connected Shelly devices. Sorry for the inconvenience but this is very much needed for future development. The release also adds all roller shutter devices for Homey Cloud / Beta. A firmware update action card for Shelly Plus/Pro devices for Homey Pro has been added. Some device icons for new Plus and Pro devices have been updated. And it contains lots and lots of code improvements.

3.9.0.en: The release contains a breaking change. Action events for Plus/Pro devices have been updated to be able to add double push event. Due to this change you will need to update all flows using the generic action event trigger for Plus/Pro devices. The release also fixes action events of the Shelly i4 and manual pairing where auto discovery is not available.

3.9.1.en: The release contains a breaking change. Action events for Plus/Pro devices have been updated to be able to add double push event. Due to this change you will need to update all flows using the generic action event trigger for Plus/Pro devices. The release also fixes action events of the Shelly i4 and manual pairing where auto discovery is not available.

3.9.2.en: This release adds support for short- and long push events for Shelly 1 on Homey Pro and Homey Cloud and for button down and button up events for Plus and Pro devices on Homey Pro. It also contains some code improvements that caused log cluttering.

3.9.3.en: This release adds support for short- and long push events for Shelly 1 on Homey Pro and Homey Cloud and for button down and button up events for Plus and Pro devices on Homey Pro. It also contains some code improvements that caused log cluttering and fixes a bug with setting the dim level when a light is powered off for GEN1 devices on Homey Pro.

3.9.4.en: This release adds support for password authentication for Plus/Pro devices on Homey Pro. It also adds an action card for setting the eco mode of powered Shelly devices on Homey Pro and fixes an issue with the inputs for the Shelly i4.

3.9.5.en: This release adds a generic update all firmware action card for Homey Pro. It also fixes an issue with roller shutters on Homey Cloud and an issue with authentication for multichannel Plus/Pro devices on Homey Pro.

3.9.6.en: The release fixes the following issues. Fix for out of range errors for GEN1 roller shutter devices on Homey Pro and Homey Cloud. Fix for button events of Shelly Button 1 for Homey Cloud and fix for action events being triggered right after app update or directly after pairing a device on Homey Cloud.

3.9.7.en: Code improvements for upcoming Homey firmware 7.4.x. No functional changes.

3.9.8.en: Code improvements for upcoming Homey firmware 7.4.x. No functional changes.

3.9.9.en: This release fixes handling inputs on multichannel devices on Homey Cloud. It also fixes various capabilities being out of range on both Homey Pro and Homey Cloud. A there is some better error handling when connecting to Shelly Cloud for Homey Cloud.

3.9.10.en: Small bugfixes causing some devices to appear as offline after the latest release.

3.9.11.en: This release fixes two issues. There is a fix for multichannel Plus and Pro devices on Homey Cloud and Homey Pro and a fix for some devices appearing as offline due to an error in status updates on Homey Pro.

3.9.12.en: This release fixes the following bugs. Fix for a bug with the Shelly Motion sensor not updating on Homey Pro. Fix for a bug where battery operated devices would not come online after an app update for Homey Pro and Homey Cloud. And fix for a bug for setting the roller shutter position on Plus devices for Homey Pro.

3.10.0.en: Important message: this release contains some non-breaking but fundamental changes. All previous device drivers have been deprecated for both Homey Pro and Homey Cloud. They have been replaced by a single unified driver for all Shelly devices. Your already paired devices will continu to function but new devices should be paired with this new driver. This will make adding future devices to the ever growing collection of Shelly devices a lot easier. The release also adds total energy consumption for Shelly 3EM for Homey Pro and Cloud, total power consumption for Shelly RGBW2 for Homey Pro and Cloud, includes a fix for Shelly TRV target temperature being out of bounds and causing an app crash and has some various minor code improvements.

3.11.0.en: Upcoming breaking change: the next release will remove all old Plus/Pro drivers, please migrate to the new unified driver before updating to version 3.12.0 which will be released early september. This release adds an action card for the Shelly EM and 3EM to change the energy cumulative behaviour. The default is true but this allows you to change it to false. It also contains other minor improvements.

3.11.1.en: Upcoming breaking change: the next release will remove all old Plus/Pro drivers for both Homey Pro and Cloud. Please migrate to the new unified driver before updating to version 3.12.0 which will be released early september. This release fixes an issue with devices not responding on Homey Cloud in certain scenarios. It also adds an action card for the Shelly EM and 3EM to change the energy cumulative behaviour. The default is true but this allows you to change it to false. It also contains other minor improvements.

3.12.0.en: Breaking change: This release removes the previously deprecated drivers for all Shelly Plus/Pro devices on Homey Pro and Homey Cloud. If you have missed or ignored previous communication about this, you will have to re-pair these devices with the new generic Shelly device driver. The release also contains some minor performance improvements and the support for specific hardware revisions of Pro devices.

3.12.1.en: This release fixes a bug where the Input Turned Off trigger card is not available for some gen1 devices that have not been paired yet with the new generic driver.

3.12.2.en: This release fixes an issue of not being able to select a device in the generic action event trigger card.

3.12.3.en: This release fixes an issue with action events for recently paired Plus/Pro devices on Homey Pro. It also fixes an issue with Plus/Pro devices loosing connection on Homey Pro when authentication has been enabled.

3.12.4.en: This release fixes an issue with the Valve position changed trigger card not being available for the Shelly TRV when still paired with the deprecated driver. It also contains a code change in an attempt to fix a memory leak for users with multichannel devices.

3.13.0.en: Fix for action event trigger card showing an error when users has skipped major updates and broken the upgrade path for Homey Pro and Homey Cloud. Also some improvements in the cloud connection to better handle invalid oauth2 sessions for Homey Cloud.

3.13.1.en: This release adds an action card for sending custom commands using the API documentation on Homey Pro. This is for advanced users only! It also adds functionality to automatically turn of a light when setting dim to 0 on Homey Pro and Homey Cloud. And it introduces a mechanism for updating the IP address for gen2 devices when an incoming status updates doest match the registered IP address of the Shelly device. You should still use static IP addresses for your devices though.

3.13.2.en: This release fixes an issue with Homey Cloud and devices not being updated. It also fixes an issue with setting dim and color on the RGBW2 for Homey Cloud. And it adds an action card for reseting the energy totals of the Shelly EM and Shelly 3EM on Homey Pro.

3.14.0.en: IMPORTANT: the current generic cloud driver for cloud connected devices is deprecated and replaced by a new generic cloud driver. There is an issue with the current generic cloud driver resulting in custom trigger cards not being available for devices paired with this driver. Unfortunately there is no way to resolve this programmatically. You are asked to re-pair your cloud connected devices on Homey Cloud. The deprecated driver will be removed early next year resulting in devices connected with this driver to fail.
